name: Athletics
description: Your Strength (Athletics) check covers difficult situations you encounter while climbing, jumping, or swimming. Examples include trying to climb a sheer or slippery cliff, avoiding hazards while scaling a wall, or clinging to a surface while something is trying to knock you off.
typicalUses: Climb a steep or slippery surface
Make a difficult jump across a gap or to a height
Swim in treacherous currents or rough water
Grapple or shove a creature (contest vs Athletics or Acrobatics)
Resist being pushed or pulled against your will
